title: Drawing, "Spring, Lunette for Ceiling, Sala Ottagonale, Palazzo Milzetti, Faenza", 1804–05
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and light brown wash over graphite on white laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed on verso in pen and brown ink, center: Al Sig/ Michele Keck/ Pittore 5 - 15 Roverese/ Roma
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Flying winged putto holding garland above his head.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Spring, Lunette for Ceiling, Sala Ottagonale, Palazzo Milzetti, Faenza", 1804–05.
1804–05. Pen and brown ink, brush and light brown wash over graphite on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1190.
